name: bee amigurumi
notes:
bee crochet pattern - crochet bumblebee amigurumi pattern - crochet pdf tutorial - instant download

includes instructions for a crochet bee.

cute crochet bee to make for yourself or for a gift.

***please note that this pattern is available for free on my blog www.crochet365knittoo.com. the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read, printable, and ad-free version of the pattern. ***

materials needed:
- worsted weight cotton yarn (exact brand and color provided)
- crochet hook size g
- 6mm safety eyes
- tapestry needle for weaving in ends.

bee measures 2.5" end to end and about 2" tall (belly to tips of wings)

pattern is written in english, using standard american terms 

level: advanced beginner
